abstract: South African government announces it will appeal parole of Janusz Walus, who is serving life sentence for killing prominent anti-apartheid activist Chris Hani in 1993.

headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: Government Will Appeal Decision to Parole an Activist’s Killer
headline.main: South Africa to Fight Parole for Killer of Anti-Apartheid Activist

snippet: The government said it would appeal the release of Janusz Walus, who had been serving a life sentence for the murder of Chris Hani in 1993.
lead_paragraph: The government said it would appeal the release of Janusz Walus, who had been serving a life sentence for the murder of Chris Hani in 1993.
